sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ClusterStateRoleList</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ClusterStateRoleList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ClusterStateRoleList = Class.create();
ClusterStateRoleList.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	process: function() {	
		var choiceList = new GlideChoiceList();

		var ga = new GlideAggregate("sys_node_type");
		ga.groupBy("role");
		ga.query();		
		while(ga.next()) {
			var role = ga.getValue("role");
			choiceList.add(new GlideChoice(role, role));
		}
		
		return choiceList;
		
	},

    type: 'ClusterStateRoleList'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-12 00:45:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>755ff41edb7ae410573e651e139619b4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ClusterStateRoleList</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Cluster Plugin" source="com.snc.cluster">32cc74836d2220100acb70b353433026</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_755ff41edb7ae410573e651e139619b4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 01:14:29</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>444</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
